mapper.select: select sc.* from inno72_supply_channel sc left join inno72_supply_channel_goods cg on sc.id=cg.supply_channel_id where sc.machine_id=#{machineId} and sc.is_delete=0 and cg.goods_id=#{goodsId}

select * from ( SELECT sum( sc.goods_count ) totalCount, goods.NAME goodsName, goods.id goodsId FROM inno72_supply_channel sc INNER JOIN inno72_supply_channel_goods scg ON sc.id = scg.supply_channel_id INNER JOIN inno72_goods goods ON scg.goods_id = goods.id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON sc.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN view_machine_goods vmg on vmg.machine_id=m.id WHERE m.machine_status = 4 AND m.machine_code = #{machineCode} AND sc.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY goods.id ) a where a.totalCount is not null

select * from ( SELECT sum( sc.goods_count ) goods_count, goods.name goodsName, m.machine_code machineCode, CONCAT( aa.province, aa.city, aa.district, IF(aa.circle = '其他' OR aa.circle IS NULL,'',aa.circle), IFNULL(l.mall,""), IFNULL(l.name,"") ) AS localeStr FROM inno72_supply_channel sc INNER JOIN inno72_supply_channel_goods scg ON sc.id = scg.supply_channel_id INNER JOIN inno72_goods goods ON scg.goods_id = goods.id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON sc.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa ON aa.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN view_machine_goods vmg on vmg.machine_id=m.id WHERE m.machine_status = 4 AND scg.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND sc.is_delete = 0 AND m.machine_code = #{machineCode} ) a where a.goods_count is not null
